description: Title or category of the inspection/maintenance checklist this line item belongs to (e.g., vehicle, equipment, generator).
Line number within the checklist template; used for display or grouping, not necessarily the execution order (confirm with SME).
Execution sequence for this task within the checklist; controls the order tasks should be performed or validated.
Free-text description of the inspection or maintenance step the technician must perform.
Likely specifies the expected response format for this task (e.g., pass/fail, numeric value, text); confirm with SME.
Likely identifies the meter reading associated with this task (e.g., odometer, engine hours); confirm with SME.
User ID of the person who created this checklist line.
Timestamp when this checklist line was created.
User ID of the person who last updated this checklist line.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this checklist line.
Identifier for the task in a master task library or system; may be blank when adâ€‘hoc (confirm with SME).
Indicates whether completing this task is mandatory before the checklist can be submitted (Y/N).
Estimated labor hours needed to complete this task.
